tit.cmt: (京都府) を追加しました。

sen.j: 松ヶ崎駅（まつがさきえき）は、京都府京都市左京区松ヶ崎六ノ坪町にある、京都市営地下鉄京都市営地下鉄烏丸線の鉄道駅。
sen.e: Located in Matsugasaki-Rokunotsubo-cho Sakyo, Ward Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, Matsugasaki Station is a stop on the Karasuma Line, which is operated by Kyoto City Subway
sen.cmt: ”京都市営地下鉄京都市営地下鉄”：”京都市営地下鉄”がだぶっていると考え、一方を削除したとして訳してあります。
sen.e: Matsugasaki Station, located in Matsugasaki-Rokunotsubo-cho Sakyo, Ward Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a stop on the Karasuma Line, which is operated by Kyoto City Subway.
Matsugasaki Station, located in Matsugasaki-Rokunotsubo-cho, Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a stop on the Karasuma Line, which is operated by Kyoto Municipal Subway.
sen.cmt: カンマの位置を変更しました。City →municipal としました。

sen.j: 駅番号はK02。
sen.e: The station number is K02.
The station number is K02.
The station number is K02.

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: プラットホーム1面2線の地下駅。
sen.e: This station is placed underground, with an island platform serving two tracks.
The station is situated underground, with an island platform serving two tracks.
The station is situated underground, with an island platform serving two tracks.

sen.j: 改札口は1ヶ所のみ。
sen.e: Only one entrance/exit gate place is provided.
Only one entrance/exit gate place is provided.
Only one ticket gate is provided.
sen.cmt: 改札口→ticket gateとしました。

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 駅は北山通の地下に位置する。
sen.e: This station is located in the underground of Kitayama-dori Street.
This station is located in the underground of Kitayama-dori Street.
This station is located in the underground of Kitayama-dori Street.

sen.j: 周辺は1970年代以降に発達した住宅地である。
sen.e: The area around the station is a residential district developed since the 1970s
The area around the station is a residential district that has developed since the 1970s.
The area around the station is a residential district that has developed since the 1970s.

sen.j: コナカ京都北山店
sen.e: The Konaka store in Kitayama, Kyoto CIty
The Konaka store in Kitayama, Kyoto City
The Konaka store in Kitayama, Kyoto City

sen.j: 北側には五山送り火の「妙」・「法」で知られる山がある。
sen.e: On the north, the mountain famous for "妙" and "法"in the bonfires for sending back the spirits of the deads in the five mountains is located (on this mountain, the bonfires are shaped in the forms of the Chinese characters of 妙 and 法).

To the north is located the mountain famous for "妙" and "法"in the bonfires for sending back the spirits of the dead in the five mountains (on this mountain, the bonfires are shaped in the forms of the Chinese characters of 妙 and 法).

To the north is located the mountain famous for '妙' and '法' in Gozan Okuribi (the bonfires for sending back the spirits of the dead in the five mountains) (on this mountain, the bonfires are shaped in the forms of the Chinese characters of 妙 and 法).
sen.cmt: " → ' としました。五山送り火 を追加しました。

sen.j: 京都バスは駅東寄りの「松ヶ崎海尻町」バス停のみが最寄であるが、京都市営バスは駅西寄りの「松ヶ崎駅前」も利用できる（松ヶ崎海尻町を始終着とする京都バス路線は行先表示を「松ヶ崎駅」としている）。
sen.e: Only the Matsugasaki Kijiri-cho bus stop on the east side of this station, used by Kyoto Bus, is the bus stop nearest to this station, but the Matsugasaki Station-mae (in front of Matsugasaki Station) on the west side, utilized by Kyoto City Bus, can also be used (the Kyoto City buses on the routes starting at and returning to Matsugasaki Kijiri-cho display their diiestinations as "Matsugasaki Station."

The Matsugasaki Kijiri-cho bus stop on the east side of this station, used by Kyoto Bus, is the bus stop nearest to this station, but Matsugasaki Station-mae (in front of Matsugasaki Station) on the west side, as utilized by Kyoto City Bus, can also be used (the Kyoto City buses on the routes starting at and returning to Matsugasaki Kijiri-cho display their destinations as "Matsugasaki Station."

The Matsugasaki Kaijiri-cho bus stop on the east side of this station, used by Kyoto Bus, is the bus stop nearest to this station, but Matsugasaki Eki-mae (in front of Matsugasaki Station) on the west side, as utilized by Kyoto City Bus, can also be used (the buses of the Kyoto Bus on the routes starting at and returning to Matsugasaki Kaijiri-cho display their destinations as 'Matsugasaki Station.')
sen.cmt: Kyoto City buses →buses of the Kyoto Busとしました。

sen.j: 1997年（平成9年）6月3日 烏丸線国際会館 - 北山間の開通とともに開業。
sen.e: June 3, 1997: Operation of this station started when the Karasuma Line started its operation between Kokusai Kaikan (the internation conference hall) and Kitayama.
June 3, 1997: This station began operating when the Karasuma Line started its operation between Kokusai Kaikan (the international conference hall) and Kitayama.
June 3, 1997: This station began operating when the Karasuma Line started its operation between Kokusaikaikan (the international conference hall) and Kitayama.

sen.j: 2007年（平成19年）4月1日 PiTaPa使用開始。
sen.e: April 1, 2007, PiTaPa became usable.
April 1, 2007, PiTaPa became usable.
April 1, 2007: PiTaPa became usable.
sen.cmt: コロン に変更しました。

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。
